pkgmetadata.longdescription: # IntentA collection of my frequently rewritten or ignored functionality.Generally tries to just use the standard library, so any 3rd-party libraries need to prove their worth# Assumptions## >= 3.10 Python## Type Everything# Submodules## NdjsonBasic functions for working with ndjson, a newline-delimited list of json objectsUseful for appending data to## Utils## Api## ClyLibrary for Extremely Easy CLI apps## DatetimeSome date and time based helper functions## ErrorsAll errors for the submodules## Sqlite
